title: MySQLREVERSE()Function

metadata.description: Learn about MySQLREVERSE()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Reverse a string:
SELECT REVERSE("SQL Tutorial");

Definition and Usage
The REVERSE() function reverses a string and returns the result.
Syntax
REVERSE(
string
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
string
Required. The string to reverse
Technical Details
Works in:
From MySQL 4.0
More Examples
Example
Reverse the text in CustomerName:
SELECT REVERSE(CustomerName)
FROM Customers;

★
+1
